attributes.value:
var list=[
'4mWalk',
'Blood',
'Blood2',
'ChairRise',
'ConclusionQuestionnaire',
'ContraIndications',
'Deviation_AE_CRF',
'DiseaseSymptoms',
'EventPMT',
'GenHealth',
'HearingQuestionnaire',
'NeuropsychologicalBatteryScoring',
// 'OS', PART OF DCS_PHONE
'OSIPV',
// 'ProxyConChoices', PART OF DCS_PHONE
'QualityAssuranceIH',
'QuestionnaireBoneDensity',
'SocialNetwork',
'StandingBalance',
'StroopFAS',
'TUG',
'TimeBasedProspectiveMemoryTask',
'Urine',
'VisionAcuity'
]
$('clsa-dcs-f2.Participants:Admin.StageInstance.stage').asSequence().filter(function(v){
  return -1!=list.indexOf(v.value())
})
